lines.text: If The Lord moves in mysterious ways, then The Devil shall move in mysterious ways as well.
Because I'm Chaos, it is my destiny to destroy...
The price of action is colossal. And we are going to hell.

Oh, oh... I wanted to talk to you about Carol. You left her at home... all alone that night... and those kids got in the house and... sooo senseless but... with you at the corner pub? Do you know what your wife's last thought on this Earth was? Felix? She HATED you... for not being there to save her life.
